about.heading: Who Am I?
about.description: I am Alper Bayram, a software engineer providing end-to-end development support for startups and individual clients across web, e-commerce, and mobile products.

items.question: Do you work with startups and individual clients?
items.answer: Yes. I provide software development support for both early-stage startups and individual professionals.

items.question: Can you build both web and mobile products?
items.answer: Yes. I build web platforms and mobile applications with a consistent product and technical strategy.

items.question: Do you offer SEO-friendly website development?
items.answer: Yes. I set up technical SEO fundamentals including structured metadata, semantic content, and performance-oriented implementation.

items.question: Can you upgrade an existing project?
items.answer: Yes. I can audit your current codebase, improve architecture, and ship incremental upgrades.

items.question: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
items.answer: Yes. I support projects after launch with maintenance, optimizations, and new features.

items.question: Can I hire you as a software support specialist for an existing project?
items.answer: Yes. I provide software support services for active products, including bug fixing, feature delivery, and architecture improvements.

items.question: How quickly can we start if I need to hire a developer?
items.answer: After a short discovery call, I define scope, timeline, and milestones so we can start implementation quickly.
